title: The Brief – The Washington affair is over, Meloni finds comfort with Merz
summary_full: As with other ‘special relationships’, Meloni will have to compromise to get behind Merz. But at least Berlin is a safer bet than Washington
summary_public: As with other ‘special relationships’, Meloni will have to compromise to get behind Merz. But at least Berlin is a safer bet than Washington

DE.label: positive
DE.evidence: Berlin is a safer bet than Washington
